name: Bronto Newsletter Signup
author: Scottish Borders Design

sections.description: This plugin will allow you to display a bronto signup form by using the shortcode [bronto_signup] anywhere on your wordpress website.
sections.installation:
WordPress:
1. Search for Bronto Newsletter Signup
2. Click Install
3. Press Activate

Uploading:
1. Download sbd-bronto-newsletter.zip
2. Upload sbd-bronto-newsletter to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

sections.changelog:
2.0.5

  • Fixed an issue that caused the plugin to occasionally show “invalid email address” when an email was valid
  • ** You MAY need to reset your custom form inputs! **

2.0.4

  • Multiple signup forms are now here! – You can now use [bronto_signup] as many times as you want on 1 page (popups, sidebars, footers etc…)
  • You MAY need to reset the Form HTML in the Bronto Settings menu (in the WP Admin Area)

2.0.3

  • Fixed problem with plugin showing up twice in the plugins menu

2.0.2

  • Error messages now display in the appropriate colour
  • Now handles error messages far better

short_description: Display a bronto signup form anywhere on your wordpress website with a simple shortcode.
description: This plugin will allow you to display a bronto signup form by using the shortcode [bronto_signup] anywhere on your wordpress website.

upgrade_notice.2.0: Major code overhaul, you now use shortcodes instead of attaching it to the footer. To update your current installation, anywhere you want the signup for to display, simply add the shortcode [bronto_signup]
